data.Name: Upstream Tech
data.About: Upstream Tech is a technology company that builds decision-making tools for environmental conservation to improve natural resource management. We harness technological advancements in remote sensing, computer science, and machine learning to create customizable planning and monitoring platforms for conservation organizations focused on agriculture, wetlands, water management, and beyond.
data.Tagline: Powering smart conservation on a changing planet

data.Name: Ministry of Water and Environment (MWE), Republic of Uganda
data.About: The Ministry of Water and Environment (MWE) was established in 2007, from the then Ministry of Water, Lands and Environment, following the cabinet decision taken on 15th April, 2007. It has the overall responsibility of the development, managing, and regulating water and Environment resources in Uganda.
data.Tagline: The Ministry of Water and Environment (MWE) was established in 2007, from the then Ministry of Water, Lands and Environment, following the cabinet decision taken on 15th April, 2007. It has the overall responsibility of the development, managing, and regulating water and Environment resources in Uganda.

data.Name: Descartes Labs
data.About:
A data refinery, built to understand our planet
Instant access to science-ready imagery and intelligence from multiple data sources.

For decades, sensors have been collecting data about our planet. Yet complex global systems like agriculture, deforestation, water cycles, and many others, affect billions but are still poorly understood. Not only are these systems critical to understand for the good of humanity, they're also important for businesses as they adapt to — and attempt to thrive in — an ever-changing environment.

We are seeing an exponential rise in the number of real-world sensors, producing ever more data. Combining multiple sources provides a far richer view than that of any single data source. To harness this power and enable global-scale computation, it's necessary to have a data refinery that combines data from diverse sources, cleans it up and makes it ready for modeling - and a platform upon which to build living, learning models. That's exactly what we've built at Descartes Labs.
data.Tagline: To better understand the planet, for good and for profit.

data.Name: Cornell Atkinson Center for Sustainability
data.About: The Cornell Atkinson Center for Sustainability is the hub of collaborative sustainability research at Cornell University, forging vital connections among researchers, students, staff, and external partners. The center’s funding and programming accelerate groundbreaking research within and across all of Cornell’s colleges and schools. In turn, the center is the university’s home to bold ideas and powerful new models that ensure people and the planet not only survive, but thrive.

data.Name: Bright Power
data.Tagline: Bright Power provides practical energy management and solar energy solutions.

data.Name: Algasol
data.Tagline: The world's most cost efficient, high yielding patented PhotoBioReactor.

data.Name: AguaClara Reach
data.About: AguaClara Reach is dedicated to revolutionizing access to safe water around the world. We are a nonprofit technical support organization that seeks to promote and facilitate the implementation of water treatment systems using AguaClara Technologies. AguaClara Reach fulfills this mission by transferring technical expertise and know-how to selected local partners who, collectively, can build plants in thousands of communities worldwide.
data.Tagline: AguaClara Reach brings the world closer to universal access to safe water on tap.

data.Name: 2NDNATURE
data.About: By embedding proven science within an enterprise cloud platform, 2NDNATURE empowers municipalities to effectively manage their stormwater assets to build healthy and sustainable cities.
data.Tagline: 2NDNATURE makes it easy for cities to benchmark, manage and improve the quality of their urban waterways

data.Name: Zero Mass Water
data.About: Zero Mass Water is a renewable water company whose product SOURCE Hydropanels make drinking water using sunlight and air alone. Deployed across 6 continents in 27 countries, SOURCE is perfecting water for every person in every place.

data.Name: Sofar
data.About: Sofar builds accessible ocean sensing and exploration tools for ocean enthusiasts, industry, and conservation.
data.Tagline: We build accessible ocean sensing and exploration tools for ocean enthusiasts, industry, and conservation.

data.Name: Saildrone
data.About: Saildrone designs and manufactures wind and solar-powered autonomous surface vehicles called saildrones, which make cost-effective ocean data collection possible at scale. We are building the world's largest high-resolution ocean datasets, working with governments and private companies around the globe.
data.Tagline: Saildrone designs, manufactures, and operates a global fleet of wind-powered ocean drones to monitor our planet.

data.Name: Pelagic Data Systems
data.About: Raising the global standard for vessel tracking and providing data solutions for fisheries around the world.
data.Tagline: Pelagic Data Systems: Data Solutions For The Marine World.

data.Name: Oasys Water
data.About: Transforming the world's most challenging industrial brines into valuable water resources with Forward Osmosis (FO)-based technology.
data.Tagline: Oasys Water develops energy and resource recovery products that address the growing, global water crisis.

data.Name: EcoDrone
data.About: EcoDrone designs wind and solar powered autonomous marine drones aimed to collect Ocean Data and coastal monitoring.

data.Name: Desolenator
data.About: Patented system combines the thermal and electrical energy from a PV panel, with a process of heat exchange to produce pure water

data.Name: Desalitech
data.Tagline: Desalitech develops reverse osmosis systems, providing an efficient and cost-effective water supply and wastewater treatment solution.

data.Name: Aquabyte
data.About: Count sea lice and accurately measure biomass in real-time while reducing cage furniture. Our experts‑in‑the‑loop ensure that every single prediction is correct.
data.Tagline: Aquabyte builds software to solve the world’s food sustainability issues.
